title: Ghosn Fleeing Trial in Japan, 2020 Outlook
itunes:title: Ghosn Fleeing Trial in Japan, 2020 Outlook
description:
Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Scott Deveau discusses Hudson’s Bay Chairman Richard Baker and his partners approaching minority shareholders about potentially raising their offer to take the Canadian retailer private. Bloomberg News Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli talks about President Trump saying he will sign a phase-one China trade deal on Jan. 15th. Bloomberg News U.S. Autos Team Leader Craig Trudell breaks down Carlos Ghosn fleeing trial in Japan for a Lebanese homeland. Greg Sarian, CEO & Founder at Sarian Strategic Partners HighTower shares his insight on trade war progress and expectations for increased volatility ahead. And we Drive to the Close with Sylvia Jablonski, Managing Director at Direxion Investments.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway.
